overview:
To understand this Hello World, open the webconfig.json file. NodeAtlas is config-driven that means all capability can be extend from the configuration. If you are here from / url, a 301 permanent redirection was done as you can see amongs routes for the entry with redirect parameter.

Global Configuration for this Webconfig

  • The website run from httpPort 8080.
  • By default each page use the languageCode fr-fr.
  • If there is a pageNotFound it's the same content from /erreur.html it is displayed.
  • The CSS are written into stylus files and using the --generate command will output static files and perform an assetsCopy of CSS files.
  • Finally, each page can provide a content from common variation file and hooks actions from common controller.

Current Page Configuration

This configuration page come from entry with url set to index.html. A view file used is setted for HML displaying, a variation file is setted for textual content of the website and a controller file is setted to hook this page to add a second ! in the title (see controller/index.js file). Because this page use the default languageCode fr-fr the content file used come from variation/fr-fr/. A same for international page was created with the url /english/index.html. In order to find a variation in this language, a languageCode en-us is setted to displaying the content of variation/en-us/.
